name: 阿南特·维哈特·夏尔马
name_full: 阿南特·维哈特·夏尔马 Anant Vidhaat Sharma
introduction: Anant Vidhaat is an Indian Actor, who has worked in many Hindi Films and web series. He made his debut with YRF production's Movie 'Gunday'(2014) followed by 'Mardaani'(2014). But it was 'Sultan'(2016) where he got real recognition and love by the audiences for his portrayal of a selfless friend's character 'Govind'. Later projects include 'Tiger Zinda Hai'(2017) 'Pati Patni aur Woh'(2020) And a much acclaimed web series 'MAI'(2022) for Netflix where his character 'Prashant' fetched him lot of acclaim from critics and audiences alike. His First lead Movie 'Mere Desh Ki Dharti' (2022) Anant's Upcoming Projects include 'Tiger 3' to be released in 2023. Besides Films and web shows Anant has also been a part of a short film 'Pandit Usman' (2020)
